thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anhui Sunhere Pharmaceutical Excipients sees FY 2017 net profit down 5 pct to up 10 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anhui Sunhere Pharmaceutical Excipients sees FY 2017 net profit down 5 pct to up 10 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - anhui sunhere pharmaceutical excipients co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Anhui Sunhere Pharmaceutical Excipients Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 5 percent to increase by 10 percent, or to be 46.3 million yuan to 53.7 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 48.8 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/wQ6Qax
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
